gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.runtime
Class MultiLauncher

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.runtime.MultiLauncher

public class MultiLauncher
extends Object

The MultiLauncher's responsibility is to execute multiple RuntimeCommand.
This class has only a main method, that takes the name of a RuntimeCommand class as argument. Then it loads the class, creates an instance of it and executes it.

          Executes a set of commands.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws ClassNotFoundException,
                        InstantiationException,
                        IllegalAccessException,
                        UnexpectedException,
                        DataException,
                        LogicException
Executes a set of commands. If any of them fails, the jvm exits.

Parameters:
args - Multiple argument are expected. The arguments must be names of RuntimeCommands class. This class are loaded and then an instance of it is instantiated and executed.
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - If the class specified as argument is not found.
IllegalAccessException - At instantiation of the RuntimeCommand.
InstantiationException - At instantiation of the RuntimeCommand.
LogicException - Thrown by the RuntimeCommand.
DataException - Thrown by the RuntimeCommand.
UnexpectedException - Thrown by the RuntimeCommand.
